description:
Sandle Alarcon was an Alliance Rear Admiral.
He was killed following the Eighth Battle of http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn], when his and Rear Admiral http://anidb.net/ch808 [Guen]`s fleets were destroyed in pursuit of the retreating Imperial survivors.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Sandle Alarcon
